name: IMDb Ratings
description: Downloads the IMDb ratings flat file daily and updates CommunityRating on all library items with an IMDb ID, without touching any other metadata.
overview: Scheduled task that keeps Jellyfin community ratings in sync with IMDb

versions.changelog:
## What's Changed

- Handle PascalCase and camelCase config keys in config page (72764f4)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.12...1.0.0.13

## What's Changed

- Sort using directives (731bbfc)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.11...1.0.0.12

## What's Changed

- Add parser unit tests (d6310ef)
- Rewrite parser with byte-buffer I/O and Utf8Parser for lower allocations (c78aad6)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.10...1.0.0.11

## What's Changed

- Add opt-in sampled debug logging for per-item skip reasons (0298c33)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.9...1.0.0.10

## What's Changed

- Throttle progress reporting to integer bucket boundaries (f3f7a02)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.8...1.0.0.9

## What's Changed

- Filter parsed IMDb ratings to library items for lower memory usage (b573c28)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.7...1.0.0.8

## What's Changed

- Support episode ratings and lower minimum vote threshold (15c4e31)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.6...1.0.0.7

## What's Changed

- Replace Path.Combine to avoid CodeQL path warnings (dcc9681)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.5...1.0.0.6

## What's Changed

- Fix CodeQL findings in IMDb downloader (fb153b9)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.4...1.0.0.5

## What's Changed

- Upgrade plugin to .NET 9 and Jellyfin 10.11.6 (9bc041e)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.3...1.0.0.4

## What's Changed

- Fix config page save: use button click instead of form submit (d3a96f2)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.2...1.0.0.3

## What's Changed

- chore(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3 to 4 (eb16bae)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.1...1.0.0.2

## What's Changed

- Retry transient downloads and fall back to stale cache (1cd65c7)
- Tighten batched rating updates on failure and null parents (9683ae9)
- Improve batch update safety and input validation (98479ee)
- Batch DB writes for rating updates, grouped by parent (0899669)
- Harden IMDb ratings validation and retry handling (ca5a91d)
- Initial commit: Jellyfin IMDb ratings plugin (cb06f9f)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-imdb-rating-updater/compare/1.0.0.0...1.0.0.1

Initial release
- Daily scheduled task with manual trigger
- IMDb flat file download with 23-hour cache
- Minimum votes threshold
- Configurable library types (Movies, TV Series)
- Web UI configuration page
